test.name: Quick POST Request Test

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Dictionary Should Contain Key
kw.doc: Fails if ``key`` is not found from ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Get From Dictionary
kw.doc: Returns a value from the given ``dictionary`` based on the given ``key``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.
